about_the_game:
What is OneLittleWorld?

OneLittleWorld is a collection of mini-games offering a variety of gameplay experiences. From casual fun to more challenging goals, it has something for everyone.

Content Included

Currently, the collection features the following games:

  • BoxMover: A puzzle game inspired by Sokoban. Find the optimal route to move all boxes to their targets and complete the stages!

  • SuperAlien: An action-packed shooting game inspired by Flappy Bird. Compete for high scores while battling alien enemies!

Additionally, a save feature allows you to preserve your scores and progress, so you can pick up right where you left off.

Future Update Plans

OneLittleWorld will receive regular updates to introduce new content and improvements. Planned updates include:

  • Expansion of existing games: New stages for BoxMover and SuperAlien.

  • Visual and audio enhancements: Improved graphics, sound effects, and music.

  • Quality of life updates: UI improvements and new functionality.

Stay tuned for more updates and exciting content!

name: One Little World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 Super
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 Super

short_description: What is One Little World? A unique collection of mini-games featuring puzzles and action. Play "BoxMover," inspired by Sokoban, and "SuperAlien," a shooting-style game. Aim for high scores or clear stages for fun!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Turkish
